original_text: I will become even more undignified than this, and I will be humiliated in my own eyes. But by these slave girls you spoke of, I will be held in honor.”
korean_text: 내가 이보다 더 낮아져서 스스로 천하게 보일지라도 네가 말한 바 계집종에게는 내가 높임을 받으리라 한지라

sentences.original_text: I will become even more undignified than this
and I will be humiliated in my own eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 눈에 수치를 당할 것이다

sentences.original_text: But by these slave girls you spoke of
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신이 말한 이 여종들에 의해

sentences.original_text: I will be held in honor
